sentence.Network_en: The historian Yakut described it picturesquely as a "mother of castles".
sentence.Network_cn: 历史学家雅库特把它形象地描述为“城堡之母”。

sentence.Network_en: An art historian and collector, he was also a practising architect.
sentence.Network_cn: 他身为艺术历史学家和收藏家，同时也是一名从业建筑师。

sentence.Network_en: Historian Michael Beschloss debunks a few myths.
sentence.Network_cn: 历史学家迈克尔·贝施洛斯破除了几个不实传言。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 王陆807听力单词精选_百度文库 ... adviser n. 指导老师 historian n. 历史学家 supervisor n. 导师.
常用前缀 - 豆丁网 ... guardian (卫士)， historian (史学家)， Indian (印度人，印第安人)，.
王陆雅思听力807单词1 - 豆丁网 ... goods 货物, 美俚> 工具 historian n. 历史学家, 史家 rapid population 快速增长的人口.
六级单词表精华版 - 豆丁网 ... hinge/ n. 合页，折叶，铰链 historian/ n. 历史学家；编史家 historic/ a. 历史的；历史性的.

list.abs: every person has two education , one which he receives from others , and one , more important , which he gives himself . ( Edward Gibbon , British historian )每个人都受两种教育，一种来自别人，另一种更重要的是来自自己。(英国历史学家吉朋)
...史学家谬误（historian's fallacy）是一种非形式谬误，系假设过去的决策者对某个事件持有与现今相同的资讯与观点，并且据此做分析与评论。然而，在做历史分析时，我们应该站在时人的观点去评估一件事，而非站在今人的观点。== 参见 ==* 心理学家谬误* 心灵投射谬误<br.
most historians agree Tibets assimilation into China was established during the Yuan dynasty ( 1271-1368 ) .大多数历史学家同意西藏融入中国是始于元朝时期（公元1271-1368)。
In an even stronger pattern , historians say , many presidents had dominant and eccentric mothers ., 历史学家说 , 更明显的一个情况是 , 很多总统都有一位强势而古怪的母亲.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French historien, from Latin historia (see history)

entry.def: A historian is a person who specializes in the study of history, and who writes books and articles about it.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who is an authority on history and who studies it and writes about it

auth_sentence.content: They're joined by the historian, Michael Stewart.
auth_sentence.res_content: They're joined by the historian, Michael Stewart.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They're joined by the historian, Michael Stewart.

auth_sentence.content: To establish a pre-conceived theory...the historian sometimes distorted facts.
auth_sentence.res_content: To establish a pre-conceived theory...the historian sometimes distorted facts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To establish a pre-conceived theory...the historian sometimes distorted facts.

auth_sentence.content: Constantine's conversion' poses problems for the historian.
auth_sentence.res_content: Constantine's conversion' poses problems for the historian.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Constantine's conversion' poses problems for the historian.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"某种人,……的人"; 2. 表形容词,"……人的"; 3. 表形容词,"国家的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: lilliput小人国+ian……人的→adj.小人国的,气量小的
simi=sim+ian某种人,……的人→adj.猿的,猴的 n.类人猴
Arab阿拉伯人+ian国家的→adj.阿拉伯的
Athene雅典娜+ian国家的→adj.雅典的,雅典人的
Egypt埃及+ian国家的→adj.埃及的 n.埃及人
civil市民的+ian某种人,……的人→n.平民

stems_affixes.value_cn: 喜剧演员;喜剧作家,喜剧人物
stems_affixes.word_buile: comedy喜剧+ian某种人,……的人→comdian喜剧演员
custody保管+ian某种人,……的人→n.管理员,监护人
electric电的,导电的+ian某种人,……的人→n.电工,电学家
history历史+ian某种人,……的人→historian历史学家
library图书馆+ian某种人,……的人→n.图书馆员,图书管理员
simi=sim+ian某种人,……的人→adj.猿的,猴的 n.类人猴

stems_affixes.value_cn: 体弱的人,过份担心生病的人
stems_affixes.word_buile: vale强壮+tudi状态+nar+ian某种人,……的人→有着强壮的身体但自认为体弱
Egypt埃及+ian国家的→adj.埃及的 n.埃及人

means.word_mean: 历史学家, 史学工作者

sentences.en: As a historian, he was most typical of the times in which he lived.
sentences.cn: 作为历史学家, 他是他所处时代最有代表性的人物。

jushi.english: As a historian, he was most typical of the times in which he lived.
jushi.chinese: 作为历史学家,他是他所处时代最有代表性的人物。
他是个了不起的史学工作者。
